```{r setup, include=FALSE}
library(learnr)
library(DBI)
library(RMySQL)
library(tidyverse)
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)

# We connect to database here
con <- dbConnect(
  RMySQL::MySQL(),
  host = "sql12.freesqldatabase.com",
  user = "sql12811352",
  password = "sZ2PBZBjEd",
  dbname = "sql12811352",
  port = 3306
)

```

# Introduction

Tutorial used to test the connection with sql12.freesqldatabase.com. 

---

# 1. Connect to the Public MySQL Server

```{r connect-db}


con
```

---

# 2. List Tables

```{r list-tables}
dbListTables(con)
```

# 2. Your First SQL Query

```{r user-sql, exercise=TRUE}

 dbGetQuery(con, "SELECT * FROM  regions")
```

# 7. Disconnect (important)

```{r}
dbDisconnect(con)
```
